website_summaries.verdict: Not your traditional mixer, but can blend like the best with added features.
pros: Whips up traditional baking items with additional whisk, yet can puree soup and other silky recipes
Powerful as well with the 200-watt motor that's easily controlled
cons: Does not mix like a traditional mixer and can result in unintended texture

website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for simple juicers who want to invest their money in a product that does other things too.
pros: Some owners also use it to make lotions and more
Can extract juice from fruits if you don't mind straining out afterwards
cons: Not a traditional juicer, so only purchase if you want other functions too

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: Blade broke into two pieces while blending a creamy soup.
customer_reviews.author: Inocybe

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item to replace a previous Cuisinart Smart Stick. The previous Cuisinart immersion blender broke one ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to replace a previous Cuisinart Smart Stick. The previous Cuisinart immersion blender broke one morning as I was making my smoothie. Since I had used it every day for almost eight years, I thought that was a good life for a product. I have only used this new model for a few months. The blade broke off in my smoothie while I was mixing this morning. I will not purchase this model again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Stripped...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it a year and the mechanism is stripped. Meaning that the blade won't turn. We used it Casually for soups. I don't expect to buy a New blender yearly. That's rediculous.
customer_reviews.author: Inna Zimmerling

customer_reviews.title: A great little appliance!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy! So easy to use, super practical, and a much smoother cleanup than taking out the whole blender/processor. I've been using it often to whip up some whipped cream, and for a quick smoothie. Does great at blending soups, etc. where you don't want to necessarily liquify the whole thing. Plus it's not too loud and fits easily in a kitchen drawer!
customer_reviews.author: Romina C.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have to puree several pounds of steamed vegetables regularly; this is the best tool for the job that I've tried. I had a stainless steel one for years, had to replace it recently. I tried the less expensive white plastic model, found the power inadequate, and the button sequence inconvenient. Bought this stainless steel model: very convenient to use, very efficient. Does not come apart as easily as my original one ... that's the only issue I've found. Strong, easy to clean, has safety ON / OFF button. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great blender but very hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel Cuisinart hand blender served me well for a couple of years. It was plenty powerful and made great smoothies, which I have every morning. However, there is a small area underneath the blade, where it attaches to the mechanism, that is very difficult to keep clean. I was forced to use an old toothbrush to get at the debris that would collect here. Eventually it got to be too much of a hassle and the thought of old food particles working their way into my smoothies grossed me out and I splurged on a new Braun model that doesn't have this problem...
customer_reviews.author: W. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Broken on third use.
customer_reviews.text: This was slight and easy to use. Had it not broken after its 3rd use, it would have been a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So....
customer_reviews.text: I am sitting on the couch after a long night of getting things settled, which included cooking dinner. I attempted to use my Cuisinart HB-155PC Smart Stick to puree some ginger for dinner and I plugged in the appliance and pressed the On button and nothing happened. I was happy to have been able to assemble it without fuss... Everything seemed straight-forward. I tried a couple of more times, readjusting the pieces... Still, nothing. My S/o tried to see if it would function.....plugged it into another outlet.... Still, nothing. One thing I will also note is to Make sure you check your purchased item as soon as you get it..
customer_reviews.author: Jen L

customer_reviews.title: MUCH more useful than a standard blender
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a standard blender do to the versatility. I have found it MUCH more useful than a standard blender. Being able to blend items in the cooking pot makes for less washing up to. I found it very easy to use and clean. I think the problems that I read about in the reviews most can be alleviated by reading the users manual. The person who cut off a finger shouldn't be in the kitchen at all. This product is not as dangerous as she makes it out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Neontigress

customer_reviews.title: I find it big and clumsy for mixing drinks
customer_reviews.text: This is much bigger than I thought it would be. That cup in the photo is really big. The whisker attachment is really large. Clumsy to clean because electric outlets are not located near kitchen sinks and must unplug and carry cup with hand blender to sink to clean. Also too big to store on kitchen counter. Difficult to impossible to make slush from ice cubes in drink. It is powerful though. I use it mostly for protein drinks. My daughter has a Magic Bullet which works much better for that purpose. Probably this hand blender is not the best tool if just using it to mix drinks. Check the dimensions in the specs before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Real Doc

customer_reviews.title: Works well for us
customer_reviews.text: This works well and does exactly what we wanted it for. It's not real high end so not as powerful as some but we didn't need/want that. We didn't want all the extra attachments that come with other versions so this is good so far. Because it's not "commercial grade" we don't expect it will least forever. Expectations make a lot of difference in happiness . . .
customer_reviews.author: Bumpa

customer_reviews.title: blew up!
customer_reviews.text: after no more than six ( minimal use) weeks this item has died. I make varied fruit/ veggie smoothies regularly. I have another blender by same company a single speed, that is still going strong after three years. Purchased second as back up at work. It worked great first few times then after no more than five times started to smoke on low speed. I'm not one to complain and give all products a chance, but this one really isn't worth the hassle. Don't waist money on this poorly made product, it won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Serna

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even turn on once - check when you first buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Was so very excited to have a stick blender in my kitchen again. It was sold as new. The Cuisinart HB-155PC Smart Stick Stainless Steel Hand Blender with Whisk arrived, looked nice, was unpacked and placed in a kitchen cabinet. Six weeks later, and after the allowed return date, I took out the blender, plugged it in and nothing. Tried numerous times, and with different attachments but I just have a very heavy, long paperweight in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sue Hays

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Everybody!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas (he's probably the most difficult person to please) and he uses it ALL THE TIME. He said it's probably the best thing he's ever gotten, so if you have a curmudgeonly dad, this may be the answer. My future in-laws just got me one for my birthday and I can't wait to start making soups and smoothies with it! It's really substantial for the price. Metal casing, sturdy design, does not feel cheap at all. And the blade is super-sharp, so don't touch it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Packer

customer_reviews.title: Hand Blender - Mostly adequate
customer_reviews.text: This iunit works well in most of the functions it offers, except that the whisk attachment wires are bent out of center, causing the unit to wobble and is therefore hard to control when using it scramble eggs, for example. Even at the lowest recommended speed the oscillating whisk causes splatter. A call to the Cuisinart factory produced a prompt replacement whisk, which unfortunately, was only somewhat better than the original. The other blending blade functions well and offers the ease of use that I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dakotan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and easy to clean and use. Does not splatter or scratch the pot. I have only used it to make batter out of flour - so I can’t speak to how it would work to grind hard or chunky stuff. Is not a substitute for blender, but a good addition to kitchen that will serve specific purpose.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate image description
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate image description. I needed this blender for very specific job (mirror glaze) and was looking for one like this but unfortunately the one I got today is completely different. I’ll return it.
customer_reviews.author: Soluwka

customer_reviews.title: So useful and so handy
customer_reviews.text: So useful and so handy. Great inexpensive stick blender. I also bought some stainless steel milk shake tumblers to use when I'm making several things and don't want to clean out the plastic cup. Easy to clean. We haven't used our stand blender since we purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Kate D

customer_reviews.title: --seems like a poorly-made product--dont recommend buying it---
customer_reviews.text: the wand broke after 3 times using it!--seems like a poorly-made product--dont recommend buying it---
customer_reviews.author: nancyp

customer_reviews.title: Works Well; Poor Durability
customer_reviews.text: While it worked, it was great. Purchased because I dislike the grainy mouth-feel of protein drinks when mixed with a spoon. This hand-held blender seemed just the trick. And it was - it quickly mixed the protein powder & water into a smooth, very drinkable solution. Then, after only a few weeks of use, the blade would no longer spin. The motor was purring along, but it would not engage the mixing blades. Returned and will not try another. It's great that the lower half disconnects for easy cleanup (no worries about getting the electrical bits wet), but the design and/or materials used are bad. I never mixed anything heavier than powder & water. It should have lasted for years.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Comes with attachment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! It comes with a whisk attachment that I use even more than the actual blending head. I used it to make a green smoothie when I first received it and it took a LOT of blending to get it smooth. Also if there are small pieces of something, this may or may not blend those up. You can only run it for 30 seconds or so according to the directions so, the "blender" title is a little misleading, but it's VERY handy still.
customer_reviews.author: Chanayle

customer_reviews.title: The older model had one button and worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Two buttons are very difficult to handle; had to return. The older model had one button and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect. so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: for a newbie in the kitchen, this is perfect. so easy to use. love love the emersion blender for making creamy winter soups (think roasted butternut squash soup!), and the whisk is great for making whipped cream.
customer_reviews.author: margot b

customer_reviews.title: Good price but some grounds for concern.
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough so far, although there's a disquieting mechanical noise from the basic blender attachment that makes me worry about it's durability. The power head itself seems find. It is well priced, so if it lasts a year or two I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far...but
customer_reviews.text: Hmm...well, when I attach the stem to they body, there is a little twisting play there...not locked firmly in place...I don't know if I should worry about that...but works great....I like the variable speed...as I need it mostly just to whip things up like mayo etc.... Have not tried it on fruit yet...I use my other old Oster blender for that....but for small jobs, so far worked like a charm...
customer_reviews.author: vickun

customer_reviews.title: So many soups!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my most beloved winter kitchen gadget. Pros: Powerful blender Easy to use in the pot to make soups Easy to clean Seems durable (15 soups so far) Con: You have to hold together two buttons in order for the blender to operate- gets a little tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 4.5 starts I would only because the only way to store it is in the box (my last one had a holder your could mount) and also it would be great if it had some sort of shield so stuff doesn't splatter. Other than that, I love it: sliding speed control from low to high, blades, whisks. Makes whipped cream in a snap, creams my soups, etc.
customer_reviews.author: GCD

customer_reviews.title: What a powerful motor!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously didn't expect this little wand blender to blend with such gusto! We're talking homemade smoothies and chomping through ice like it's butter! The clear plastic cup scratches rather easily, and the whisk attachment is a bit flimsy ( I would recommend only whisking a few eggs, nothing thick like cake batter or anything), but the blending blade is a BEAST! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: cocade27

customer_reviews.title: Snappy Blender
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had an old GE stick blender that wasn't up to the task. All the reviews on this one convinced me to give it a try. Am very pleased. It is sleek, easy to handle, and easy to clean. Best of all, it does the job. Can highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adamo

customer_reviews.title: Not BPA-Free
customer_reviews.text: I spoke with a customer assistance rep. and she confirmed that this unit is not BPA free as stated in the amazon description. I'll just use my trusty glass jars for mixing.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Works properly and as described. I use the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Works properly and as described. I use the product everyday and often more than once. My only complaint is that the product only lasts about 18 months with heavy use. However, during that time it works well to make energy drinks, pasta sauces, and soups.
customer_reviews.author: Loyd N. Rawls

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been my whole life...
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I have had a immersion blender. I can't imagine being without one. I use both the blending and the whisking attachment all the time. It is easy clean up also. It is so much easier than getting out the hand mixer and has even replaced me using the food processer and Kitchen Aid for some things. This is probably one of my favorite products for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: M. Howry

customer_reviews.title: Useful Tool
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a gift, but I have owned the same blender for about 4 years. It does everything a conventional blender does except crush ice. Plus you can use it in a pan cooking on the stove to liquefy foods you are cooking. Example: split pea soup. The included container is useful, but really unnecessary. I have rarely used the whisk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the JOB
customer_reviews.text: Takes a beating and keeps on blending! I frequently use this to make frozen fruit smoothies, I throw frozen fruit and ice in the cup and give it a whirl. As long as you have sufficient moisture it just whizzes through the job. I occasionally use the whisk to whip up mashed potatoes, although it is flimsy it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I FREAKING LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a few times to make organic hair conditioner and let me tell you!!!! It emulsified my end product BEAUTIFULLY! Is it loud... YUP, but it is pretty powerful! It does such a wonderful job that you wouldnt even be using it long enough to care about the sound. I can't wait to make sauces and purees with it.
customer_reviews.author: CharlyH

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, powerful & not too bulky hand blender. I bought it primarily to emulsify my bulletproof coffee in the mornings and it does a great job of that for sure! I haven't blended much anything else with it yet, but my husband did make a milkshake on evening, with ease. I like the speed dial on top with the varying speeds. Cleanup is easy. There is one button to push and the shaft pops off. Watch out, that blade is super sharp! It produces minimal noise for such power. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little kitchen tool. Powerful enough for my purposes...salad dressing, mayo, etc. I wish I had bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: GA Peach

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Very powerful, and it looks pretty good, good quality, only have some troubles when I was trying to use first time, but once you learned to do that is very easy!
customer_reviews.author: alberta ceja medina

customer_reviews.title: It never worked
customer_reviews.text: Item had to be returned. Did not work out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: OneCardAway

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to My Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about ordering this and almost didn't. But - a cookbook I purchased suggested that every kitchen should have one. Well - I have used it and it was perfect! The first thing I used it for was whipping cream for a dish I was preparing! It was perfect - lightweight and just fantastic! Very easy to use too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Useful for many things
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make egg bites. It worked great. I also made soup in my instant pot and used this to make it. Good kitchen tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: RCotter

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I should have gotten one of these years ago! Can't say enough about it. I now make creamed soups all the time. Just be sure the nozzle is fully submerged in liquid so stuff doesn't fly everywhere. My next venture is a smoothie without having to drag out the blender, which takes more cleaning than the hand held one.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Love This Hand Blender!
customer_reviews.text: How did I live my live without this? No more pureeing soups in batches in a blender and risking a messy food explosion or hand whipping heavy cream.I love this hand blender!!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this blender every day since I got it - it handles smoothies, salad dressings, condiments, and soups perfectly, doesn't take up a ton of counter space, and it's easy to clean. I love it! I think this is going to be my go-to housewarming/wedding/etc gift from now on. UPDATE: -1 star, and I'm changing my relationship status with my blender to "It's Complicated." I tapped a spoon on the top of the plastic measuring cup (which is supposed to be dishwasher safe and fairly durable) and it shattered. I'm going to order a metal cup to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Saura

customer_reviews.title: bought this one to replace their cordless
customer_reviews.text: the cordless fizzled out after only a few uses and I had to dump it. I did keep the accessories as they fit this one. This one costs much less than their cordless. I wouldn't recommend the cordless..battery died and lost all power in just a few uses. I'm very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Quick Blender for batter, eggs, or smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I have a big bulky hand mixer that I have to get out of the box then attach the beaters then have to clean off after using...whew!!! I'm tired just thinking about it...but with this hand held model it is handy, fast to use and it mixes great. Glad I purchased it and with the name Cuisinart that was a bonus....great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: KOS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, god value
customer_reviews.text: Blends very smoothly, and whisk is a nice extra if tou just need to whip few egg whites and don't want to drag out the stand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Knitnut

customer_reviews.title: The "Smart Stick" is a SMART move!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Smart Stick as it lets me prepare morning shakes with ease and in no time! I can also use it to prepare breakfast & sauce-type items. I use it whenever I can and the cleanup is super quick & easy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lunde

customer_reviews.title: used in professional kitchens, must have kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: works great. I actually like the older version with no speed control better. Who ever switches it from full speed? Not me, but I can say, this immersion blender is a beast and gets used in professional kitchens for a reason. It lasts and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: techguy

customer_reviews.title: My husband liked it very much
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked it very much. Now I do not have to remind him to use it for his gravies. It is so quick that if we had a contest he would win using this. His gravy would be made while I would still be stirring mine.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Abbott

customer_reviews.title: This blender is perfect for quickly whipping up batter
customer_reviews.text: This blender is perfect for quickly whipping up batter, cream or instantly mixing up ingredients in a soup. I love the interchangeable tips and the fact that the blender end is removeable/dishwasher safe. It's very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. Elliott-Gluck

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: I make high protein drinks and pudding. Frequently I add fresh strawberries to the drink. Mixing them was a hassle until I bought the Cuisinart blender. Unit is easy to clean and extremely powerful. I really appreciate the variable speed feature.
customer_reviews.author: Shel-esq

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Strong hand blender! I like everything about it. Didn't try the whisk yet, though..
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time. Great whipped cream and good for smaller quantities when I don't want to pull out the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Although this is somewhat heavy and the controls require a bit of practice,overall the mixer meets/exceeds my expectations. The cord is not an issue. It's quite powerful and does the job effectively. My only difficulty has been cleaning under the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Little Powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: This little mixer does the job at a more than reasonable price. Professional looking stainless steel housing is sturdy and easy to clean. Just a quick rinse and its good as new. Comes with measuring cup and wisk attachment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great blender - easy to use and clean. This is my second one and I’ll buy another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: fiona

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hand blender. I make soup everyday for 25 people, and it's a gret way to puree without having to use a blender. Great to whipping eggs, or anything really. A must for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Broke within weeks, but did the job until then.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great blender for a few weeks, and then while blending coffee and protein powder (nothing hard or chunky) a blade just popped off into the drink. It's got a warranty that I'm going to try to call about, but it seems like the blender should be built to withstand a lot more than liquids.
customer_reviews.author: bschwanke

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job blending soups and applesauce; haven't tried it on ice, but it chops the apple peels so fine you barely notice they are in the sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Rainer Steinbauer

customer_reviews.title: I really love this blender!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had other blenders, and this is the best I've owned. It's powerful and a great price....but don't try to blend cookie dough like my daughter did! It's for beating eggs, milkshakes, batter or other light stuff.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as I would have thought. Isn't able to break ice but very good for fruits, protein shakes, eggs and pancake mix. Good weight, feels like a good quality product, good construction. Buttons and controls feel firm. Highly recommend for someone looking in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miers

customer_reviews.title: Works as smoothly as the soups it helps creats
customer_reviews.text: Another one of those " How did I live without this" buys. Easy to use and clean. Variable speed is easy to adjust. I should have bought it with the chopper/grinder attachments
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for everything
customer_reviews.text: Tried using this for several things and found that it really only works for very soft or liquid items, such as smoothies and shakes
customer_reviews.author: shortcake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen companion
customer_reviews.text: I have a food processor and a kitchenaid, but it's just so much easier to use this Cuisinat hand blender! My husband had one from before we were married, but the motor stopped working one day so I bought a replacement. Couldn't be happier with the product.
customer_reviews.author: FajitaBurrito

customer_reviews.title: Imersion Blender
customer_reviews.text: I would be lost without this emersion blender in my kitchen. I use it constantly for soups, drinks, and almost every mixing job. Easy cleanup, and compact in our tiny Euro kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: kfish

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen gadget junkie
customer_reviews.text: I love new kitchen gadgets and this is a favorite! So easy to use, clan and store, I've used it for super hidden veggie sauces, cauliflower "mashed potatoes" and even the hopping attachment for frostings!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this unit! I didn't realize that I could change the speed until after I got it. It's perfect for blending all sorts of soups and sauces right in the pot. Makes cooking SO much easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, beautiful and practical.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Cuisinart to make smoothies. It is great! It has been about 4 months and I seriously love it. Speed is easy to adjust, the blade part detaches easily and is dishwasher safe, power is great and it comes with a cup to make you smoothies in. I haven't used the whisk though.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Wish I had bought it years ago
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Wish I had bought it years ago. I mostly use it to blend soups. It's so easy to use and clean. Also made mashed potatoes recently with the wisk attachment and they came out pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeB

customer_reviews.title: Blends great! No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Blends great! No complaints. Just make sure whatever you're blending is deep enough for the whole blender to be submerged. Otherwise you'll have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I truly like it easy to store on my counter so it is in reaching distance for me to grab quickly. I don't know how I managed all these years w/out it.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: The whisk is nice but be careful as it can be messy
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but is not as powerful as my old Kitchen-aid I had. The whisk is nice but be careful as it can be messy....My teenager told my as I caught her wiping down the cabinets...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Daughtrey

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This hand blender is great and does the job it's supposed to do. It's easy enough to use and clean and doesn't make a giant mess.
customer_reviews.author: AlixJ18

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, love love the removable head
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, love love the removable head! It makes clean up quicker and easier! It has a powerful motor and blends quickly. Perfect replacement for my old one from the 80's.
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: I'm Impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a very expensive hand blender that I thought was great. This Cuisinart is so much better. Strong motor, not too heavy and cuts through a multitude of fruits for smoothies. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pro ShopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific! The on button is easy to use, even for arthritic fingers. The variable speed is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy Mixer
customer_reviews.text: Saves cleanup; mixes without beaters & bowl. Handy piece of kitchen equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Ninjanurse

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Of course this is because I probably never had one and love being able to blend fruity drinks and smoothies so quickly.I like that it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Open Minded

customer_reviews.title: This blender rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I don't even pull out my hand mixer anymore!! It blends or chops whatever I have used it for and cleans up soooo easy! Throw the attachments in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product and uses it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kopet

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kitchen Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Accomplishes exactly what I bought it to do, mix milkshakes in the tumbler. Haven't tried the whisk attachment, but will probably get some good use out of that as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blender! I wish I had gotten one of ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome blender! I wish I had gotten one of these ages ago! I use it for just about everything that I used to use my large mixer for. So handy and clean up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Great little stick blender
customer_reviews.text: Great little stick blender. Nice sturdy durability, good power. Although I'd like to see metal gears that connect the pieces instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hines

customer_reviews.title: BUY BUY BUY
customer_reviews.text: I've used it frequently, primarily for protein shakes. Easy to use, easy to clean, easy to store! I would recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: G & A

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use -- so easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have one of these, I wonder how I ever existed without it. I use it for smoothies, sauces -- everything. I've bought more for gifts. So easy to use -- so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Previously had a blender with plastic shaft,which broke.Wanted to buy something more durable and reliable. This blender has more positive reviews than any other brand, so I decided to give it a chance. Glad I bought it ,this blender is awesome. Like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it from the beginning much more effective and potent than a lot of its competitor I have to say was happy for this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and useful little machine
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and useful little machine...does the job wonderfully! I wore my previous one out, purchased a newer (slightly upgraded) version, and it's even quieter!
customer_reviews.author: Qinah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: For the $10 premium over some cheaper blenders on amazon this is great. Makes mayo perfectly and everything else in between. Just follow the "break" rule (blend for a minute, relax for 30 seconds) and this should last a long time. Leave blenders for smoothies and crushing. And leave food processors for chopping. Other than that, the immersion does it all
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy to finally have the ability to make puree' soups.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R. Delancett

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be able to make sorbet and smoothies. I works well for making these. Makes sorbet and smoothies quickly, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: KaDee

customer_reviews.title: great for blending smaller amounts.
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender, it is super for a 2 person family when i'm mixing smaller amounts for cooking. easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: C. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: New soaper and I love this work horse! I use it all the time and it does an amazing job. I grabbed it on sale and free shipping so I couldn't be happier. Now I need to get a back up stick for actual food uses.
customer_reviews.author: B. Noll

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I was constantly told by the internet blogs and cookbooks to buy a stick hand blender, but I felt like it's not for me, mainly because I don't make, eat, or like soups, and it's mainly for that. That's what I thought. I got this for the whisk, on a whim. Whisk on a whim. I use both interchangably to make basically everything and anything, and it works like magic. I love it! Love love love it, don't know how I lived without a stick blender. This one is very good, though I can't really compare to other brands or kinds, because this is my first, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Em G

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. The recipient likes it a lot so far
customer_reviews.author: Holly Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It has variable speed but it really isn't necessary since I always have it on high. Don't know why you would ever go slower. Works fantastic though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael903

customer_reviews.title: For fast mixes
customer_reviews.text: Indispensable if you mix or blend a lot. There's plenty of power for making a nice smoothy. I'm not looking for ideal silky smooth mixes, so this blender-mixer works for me quite well.
customer_reviews.author: oortcloud

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over how much I love this!! It is super quiet and really easy to clean! Submerging the blades in soapy water and pulsing a few times cleans it pretty well, then a quick run through the dishwasher to sanitize! Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, great price, all I wanted and then some! I was completely pleased with this and impressed with how much better it is than what I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Cuisinart HB-155PC Smart Stick Stainless Steel Hand Blender with Whisk, Silver/Black
product_meta.description: Size:155PCThe Cuisinart Smart Stick hand blender is equipped with a powerful 200-watt motor and has a variable speed control. Control speed from low to high simply by turning knob on top. Blends in pots, pitchers, blending cup and bowls. Blend and whisk, with 200-watts (max motor) of power.
feature_bullets: Blending and Whisk Attachments - 16 oz. Mixing/Measuring Beaker - BPA Free
